Uses of Interface
org.bitcoinj.store.FullPrunedBlockStore

  • Packages that use FullPrunedBlockStore 
    Package Description
    org.bitcoinj.core
    The core package contains classes for network messages like Block and Transaction, peer connectivity via PeerGroup, and block chain management.
    org.bitcoinj.store
    Block stores persist blockchain data downloaded from remote peers.

    • Uses of FullPrunedBlockStore in org.bitcoinj.core

      Fields in org.bitcoinj.core declared as FullPrunedBlockStore 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected FullPrunedBlockStore FullPrunedBlockChain.blockStore
      Keeps a map of block hashes to StoredBlocks.
      Constructors in org.bitcoinj.core with parameters of type FullPrunedBlockStore 
      Constructor and Description
      FullPrunedBlockChain(Context context, FullPrunedBlockStore blockStore)
      Constructs a block chain connected to the given store.
      FullPrunedBlockChain(Context context, List<Wallet> listeners, FullPrunedBlockStore blockStore)
      Constructs a block chain connected to the given list of wallets and a store.
      FullPrunedBlockChain(Context context, Wallet wallet, FullPrunedBlockStore blockStore)
      Constructs a block chain connected to the given wallet and store.
      FullPrunedBlockChain(NetworkParameters params, FullPrunedBlockStore blockStore)
      See FullPrunedBlockChain.FullPrunedBlockChain(Context, Wallet, FullPrunedBlockStore)
      FullPrunedBlockChain(NetworkParameters params, List<Wallet> listeners, FullPrunedBlockStore blockStore)
      See FullPrunedBlockChain.FullPrunedBlockChain(Context, List, FullPrunedBlockStore)
      FullPrunedBlockChain(NetworkParameters params, Wallet wallet, FullPrunedBlockStore blockStore)

    • Uses of FullPrunedBlockStore in org.bitcoinj.store

      Classes in org.bitcoinj.store that implement FullPrunedBlockStore 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DatabaseFullPrunedBlockStore
      A generic full pruned block store for a relational database.
      class  H2FullPrunedBlockStore
      A full pruned block store using the H2 pure-java embedded database.
      class  LevelDBFullPrunedBlockStore
      An implementation of a Fully Pruned Block Store using a leveldb implementation as the backing data store.
      class  MemoryFullPrunedBlockStore
      Keeps StoredBlocks, StoredUndoableBlocks and UTXOs in memory.
      class  MySQLFullPrunedBlockStore
      A full pruned block store using the MySQL database engine.
      class  PostgresFullPrunedBlockStore
      A full pruned block store using the Postgres database engine.
